stops.title: Tanger
stops.details: A vibrant coastal city known for its rich history and diverse culture. It is a great starting point for your journey to Agadir.

activities.title: Explore the Kasbah
activities.details: Visit this historic fortress offering stunning views of the sea and city.

activities.title: Visit the Caves of Hercules
activities.details: Legendary caves associated with Greek mythology, perfect for a short visit and photos.

activities.title: Stroll through the Medina
activities.details: Experience the vibrant souks and local craftsmanship in the heart of the city.

stops.title: Chefchaouen
stops.details: Known as the Blue City, this picturesque town is famous for its blue-painted buildings and stunning mountain backdrop.

activities.title: Walk in the Blue Streets
activities.details: Wander the iconic blue alleyways and take memorable photographs.

activities.title: Visit the Kasbah Museum
activities.details: Learn about the local history and culture in this charming museum.

activities.title: Hike to the Spanish Mosque
activities.details: A scenic hike that offers a panoramic view of the blue town.

stops.title: Marrakech
stops.details: Known for its historic medina, vibrant souks, and the famous Jemaa El-Fnaa square.

activities.title: Explore Jemaa El-Fnaa
activities.details: The bustling square filled with street performers, food stalls, and local shops.

activities.title: Visit the Majorelle Garden
activities.details: A beautiful garden featuring exotic plants, fountains, and the Berber Museum.

activities.title: Discover the Bahia Palace
activities.details: A stunning palace showcasing Moroccan architecture and beautiful gardens.

stops.title: Agadir
stops.details: A modern resort city known for its beaches, surfing, and seafood restaurants.

activities.title: Relax on Agadir Beach
activities.details: Enjoy the sun and surf on one of Morocco's best coastal beaches.

activities.title: Visit the Agadir Oufella Ruins
activities.details: Explore the historical ruins that offer panoramic views of the city.

activities.title: Walk the Marina
activities.details: Stroll along the marina filled with cafes, shops, and views of the ocean.
